abstract.t: This document registers the 'ENUMservice' 'void' using the URI scheme 'mailto:' as per the IANA registration process defined in the ENUM specification RFC3761 [2]. This 'ENUMservice' SHALL be used to indicate that the E.164 number or E.164 number range connected to the domain used in DNS as described in [2] is not assigned to an end-user in case of an E.164 number or to a communication service provider in case of an E.164 number range.
